reviewText: What is wrong with this movie seen half of it on cable so far it was good years ago they never showed it again. And now I want to purchase it ,review says it won't play on us dvd player WHY? doesn't make any sense. What about HP envy laptop computer ,Toshiba or Sony ,Portable players? Need to know ASAP.

A film totally unworthy of a great novel.

Badly shot, poorly acted, poor colour!

Read the book, DO NOT BUY THIS FILM

A great disappointment
Un ttulo bastante dificil de encontrar, aunque el fim no fue rematerizado, se ve bien y lo ms importante en espaol.
